item.description:
@MindlessPk wrote:

i need help making objects!public void AddObj(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType) { outStream.createFrame(85); outStream.writeByteC(y - (mapRegionY * 8)); outStream.writeByteC(x - (mapRegionX * 8)); outStream.createFrame(151); outStream.writeByteA(0); outStream.writeWordBigEndian(typeID); outStream.writeByteS((tileObjectType<<2) +(orientation&3)); } public void NewObjects() { AddObj(3250, 3420, 2728, -2, 10);//range [br][size=1]Posted on: April 12, 2007, 03:14:58 PM[/size][hr]is this the right code?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 12, 2007, 03:16:58 PM[/size][hr]is it?
